cmp: 回 ((a measure word for matters or actions) a time/to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Islam)
mng: see 徘徊[pai2 huai2], to dither, to hesitate, to pace back and forth, irresolute

exm.mng: to dither, to hesitate, to pace back and forth, by ext. to hover around, to linger
